fields.description: Monthly electricity consumption for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.wizard_question: Enter your monthly electricity consumption in kWh
fields.prompt: Enter the total electricity consumed (in kWh) each month from your utility provider.
fields.calculation: Sum of kWh from all electricity meters/sites over the month
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly kWh to annual total for DST reporting
quality_checks: Compare billed kWh against meter readings for consistency
Flag abnormal consumption spikes month-over-month
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for all Dubai hotels. Required for Dubai Sustainable Tourism compliance.

carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use Dubai-specific grid emission factor provided by Carbon Calculator
ef_data_dependencies: Annual grid CO2 emission factor for Dubai

intensity_outputs.equation: total kWh / total occupied room nights

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If monthly consumption = 10,000 kWh and EF = 0.00023 tCO2e/kWh, then emissions = 2.3 tCO2e.

fields.description: Monthly water consumption for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.wizard_question: Enter your monthly water consumption in cubic meters
fields.prompt: Enter the total water consumed (in cubic meters) each month.
fields.calculation: Sum of water meter readings or billed volume over the month
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly water use to annual total for DST reporting
quality_checks: Cross-verify billed water usage with meter readings
Flag anomalies (e.g., sudden surges indicating leaks)
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for all Dubai hotels. Water consumption contributes to carbon footprint through treatment and pumping energy.

carbon_specifications.co2e_equation: tCO2e = m³ × EF (water treatment and distribution)
carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use Dubai-specific water emission factor provided by Carbon Calculator

intensity_outputs.equation: total m³ / total occupied room nights

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If monthly consumption = 1,000 m³ and EF = 0.0005 tCO2e/m³, then emissions = 0.5 tCO2e.

fields.description: Monthly district cooling consumption for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.condition_logic: Hotel is connected to district cooling network
fields.wizard_question: Does your hotel use district cooling services?
fields.prompt: Enter the total district cooling energy consumed (in RT-h) each month.
fields.calculation: Sum of RT-h from all district cooling meters/sites over the month
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly RT-h to annual total for DST reporting
quality_checks: Compare billed RT-h against meter readings for consistency
Flag abnormal consumption spikes month-over-month
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for Dubai hotels using district cooling. Major source of Scope 2 emissions.

carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use provider-specific emission factor provided by Carbon Calculator
carbon_specifications.ef_readiness_state: available (provided by DST and cooling providers)

intensity_outputs.equation: total RT-h / total occupied room nights

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If monthly consumption = 50,000 RT-h and EF = 0.00009 tCO2e/RT-h, then emissions = 4.5 tCO2e.

fields.description: Monthly liquefied petroleum gas consumption for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.condition_logic: Hotel uses LPG for operations (kitchens, heating, etc.)
fields.wizard_question: Does your hotel use LPG (cooking gas) in your operations?
fields.prompt: Enter the total LPG consumed (in kg) in the month.
fields.calculation: Sum of LPG quantities used (cylinder weights or bulk deliveries)
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly LPG usage to annual total for DST reporting
quality_checks: Convert LPG units if needed (e.g., 1 cylinder = 22 kg) to maintain consistency
Check usage against operational days for anomalies
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for Dubai hotels using LPG. Common in hotel kitchens and laundry operations.

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If monthly consumption = 500 kg LPG and EF = 0.003 tCO2e/kg, then emissions = 1.5 tCO2e.

fields.description: Monthly waste sent to landfill for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.wizard_question: Enter your monthly landfill waste quantity
fields.prompt: Enter the total quantity of waste sent to landfill (kg) for the month.
fields.calculation: Sum of all waste collected from the facility sent to landfill
fields.aggregation: Aggregate waste data across all sites for DST reporting
quality_checks: Ensure units (kg/tonnes) are consistent across records
Compare waste generated per guest room against benchmarks
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for all Dubai hotels. Landfill waste generates methane emissions.

ef_data_dependencies: Landfill emission factor for mixed waste

intensity_outputs.equation: total kg waste / total guest rooms

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If 2,000 kg waste sent to landfill and EF = 0.00006 tCO2e/kg, then ~0.12 tCO2e emitted.

fields.description: Monthly waste diverted to recycling for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.condition_logic: Hotel separates and recycles part of its waste stream
fields.wizard_question: Do you segregate and recycle any of your waste?
fields.prompt: Enter the quantity of waste recycled (kg) in the month.
fields.calculation: Sum of all recycled materials collected
fields.aggregation: Aggregate recycled waste quantities across all sites for DST reporting
quality_checks: Verify that recycled amount ≤ total waste generated for same period
Cross-check recycling records against waste generation
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for Dubai hotels that recycle. Recycling avoids landfill emissions.

carbon_specifications.co2e_equation: Potential avoided emissions can be noted but not counted in inventory
carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If 500 kg recycled out of 2,000 kg total waste, recycling rate = 25%.

fields.description: Monthly petrol consumption for hotel vehicles for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.wizard_question: Do you have petrol-fueled vehicles (company cars/fleet)?
fields.prompt: Enter the total petrol fuel consumed by company vehicles (liters per month).
fields.calculation: Sum of all petrol fuel purchases for vehicles in the month
fields.aggregation: Aggregate fuel usage across all company vehicles for DST reporting
evidence_requirements: Fuel receipts or fuel card statements
quality_checks: Ensure fuel volume aligns with vehicle mileage
Separate petrol vs diesel vehicles to avoid double counting
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for Dubai hotels with petrol vehicles.

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If 200 L petrol used and EF = 0.00231 tCO2e/L, emissions ≈ 0.46 tCO2e.

fields.description: Monthly diesel consumption for hotel vehicles and generators for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.condition_logic: Hotel owns/operates diesel vehicles or generators
fields.wizard_question: Do you have diesel-fueled vehicles or generators?
fields.prompt: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed (liters per month).
fields.calculation: Sum of all diesel fuel dispensed to vehicles and generators
fields.aggregation: Aggregate across all diesel sources for DST reporting
quality_checks: Verify diesel vehicle list to ensure no petrol vehicles included
Check fuel efficiency against expected values
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for Dubai hotels with diesel vehicles or generators.

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If 300 L diesel used and EF = 0.00268 tCO2e/L, emissions ≈ 0.80 tCO2e.

fields.description: Monthly refrigerant gas leakage or refills for carbon footprint calculation as required by Dubai Carbon Calculator
fields.condition_logic: Hotel operates HVAC or refrigeration units
fields.wizard_question: Do you have air conditioning or refrigeration units that require refrigerant servicing?
fields.prompt: Enter the total amount of refrigerant (kg) added or leaked in the month.
fields.calculation: Sum of refrigerant added to all equipment over the month
fields.aggregation: If multiple refrigerant types, track each separately for DST reporting
quality_checks: Ensure units (kg) are used
Check if any major leaks are documented
fields.notes: Mandatory monthly submission to Dubai Carbon Calculator for Dubai hotels with HVAC systems. HFCs have high GWP.

carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use DST-provided GWP values for each refrigerant type
carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If 5 kg of R134a leaked, and GWP=1,300, then emissions = 5 × 1300 / 1000 = 6.5 tCO2e.

fields.description: Implementation of a sustainability management system addressing environmental, social, cultural, economic, quality, human rights, health, safety, risk and crisis management issues
fields.wizard_question: Do you have a sustainability management system?
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal sustainability management system in place? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify documentation covers all required areas
Check evidence of implementation
Review continuous improvement processes
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #1 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Monthly reporting of carbon emissions through the Dubai Carbon Calculator covering 9 emission sources: electricity, water, district cooling, LPG, landfill waste, recycled waste, petrol, diesel, and refrigerants
fields.wizard_question: Do you use the Dubai Carbon Calculator?
fields.prompt: Do you submit monthly carbon emission data through the Dubai Carbon Calculator? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify monthly submissions are completed
Check all 9 emission sources are reported
Review submission confirmation records
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #2 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Requires monthly submission of 9 emission sources through the Dubai Carbon Calculator.

fields.description: Training provided to personnel on sustainability practices and procedures
fields.wizard_question: Do you provide sustainability training to staff?
fields.prompt: Do you provide formal sustainability training to your personnel? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify training covers sustainability topics
Check staff participation records
Review training materials and content
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #3 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Establishment of a sustainability committee or team responsible for coordinating sustainability initiatives
fields.wizard_question: Do you have a sustainability committee?
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal sustainability committee or team? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify committee meets regularly
Check meeting minutes for sustainability discussions
Review committee composition and authority
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #4 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Programs for engaging and educating staff on sustainability practices and environmental responsibility
fields.wizard_question: Do you have staff engagement and education programs?
fields.prompt: Do you have formal staff engagement and education programs for sustainability? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify engagement programs exist
Check educational materials and training content
Review staff participation and feedback
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #5 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Programs and materials to educate guests about sustainability practices and encourage their participation
fields.wizard_question: Do you provide sustainability information to guests?
fields.prompt: Do you educate guests about your sustainability practices? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify materials are available to guests
Check content covers sustainability topics
Review guest feedback on environmental initiatives
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #6 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable practices for events, meetings, and conferences held at the hotel
fields.wizard_question: Do you have green event practices?
fields.prompt: Do you implement sustainable practices for events and conferences? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify green event policy exists
Check implementation for actual events
Review client satisfaction with green initiatives
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #7 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of an energy management plan including monitoring, targets, and conservation measures
fields.wizard_question: Do you have an energy management plan?
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal energy management plan in place? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify energy management plan exists and is comprehensive
Check implementation of conservation measures
Review monitoring and reporting systems
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #8 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of automated systems for energy management and efficiency optimization
fields.wizard_question: Do you have automated energy management systems?
fields.prompt: Do you have automated systems for energy management? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify automation systems are installed and operational
Check energy efficiency improvements
Review system performance data
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #9 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable transportation options for guests and staff including electric vehicles and public transport
fields.wizard_question: Do you have sustainable transportation options?
fields.prompt: Do you provide sustainable transportation options for guests and staff? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify sustainable transportation options are available
Check EV charging infrastructure
Assess public transport integration
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #10 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of water conservation measures including efficient fixtures, monitoring, and reduction targets
fields.wizard_question: Do you have water conservation measures?
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal water conservation measures in place? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify water conservation measures are implemented
Check efficient fixture installation
Review water consumption monitoring
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #11 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of wastewater management practices including treatment, reuse, and proper disposal
fields.wizard_question: Do you have wastewater management practices?
fields.prompt: Do you have formal wastewater management practices in place? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify wastewater management practices are implemented
Check treatment and reuse systems
Review disposal documentation
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #12 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of a comprehensive waste management plan including reduction, recycling, and proper disposal
fields.wizard_question: Do you have a waste management plan?
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal waste management plan in place? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify waste management plan is comprehensive
Check recycling program implementation
Review waste audit and disposal records
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #13 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable waste management practices specifically for bathroom areas including refillable dispensers and recycling
fields.wizard_question: Do you have sustainable bathroom waste management?
fields.prompt: Do you have sustainable waste management practices in bathrooms? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify refillable dispensers are installed
Check recycling bins are available in bathrooms
Review staff training on bathroom waste management
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #14 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable food waste management practices including reduction, donation, and composting
fields.wizard_question: Do you have sustainable food waste management?
fields.prompt: Do you have sustainable food waste management practices? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify food waste reduction measures are implemented
Check food donation and composting programs
Review food waste tracking and analysis
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #15 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of practices to minimize pollution including air, noise, light, and chemical pollution
fields.wizard_question: Do you have pollution minimization practices?
fields.prompt: Do you have practices to minimize pollution? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify pollution control measures are implemented
Check monitoring programs for different pollution types
Review compliance with environmental regulations
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #16 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Management and reduction of harmful substances including chemicals, pesticides, and hazardous materials
fields.wizard_question: Do you manage harmful substances?
fields.prompt: Do you have practices to manage and reduce harmful substances? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify harmful substances inventory exists
Check safety data sheets are available
Review reduction initiatives and safer alternatives
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #17 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable purchasing practices including local, eco-friendly, and ethical sourcing
fields.wizard_question: Do you have sustainable purchasing practices?
fields.prompt: Do you have sustainable purchasing practices? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify sustainable purchasing policy exists
Check supplier sustainability assessments
Review eco-labeled and local procurement data
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #18 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Engagement with and support for local communities through various initiatives and partnerships
fields.wizard_question: Do you engage with local communities?
fields.prompt: Do you have formal local community engagement initiatives? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify community engagement programs exist
Check local hiring and procurement practices
Review community impact and feedback
fields.notes: Mandatory requirement #19 under Dubai Sustainable Tourism's 19 Sustainability Requirements. Required for all Dubai hotels.

fields.description: Calculation of the establishment's carbon footprint using a carbon measurement tool
fields.wizard_question: Do you calculate your establishment's carbon footprint annually?
fields.prompt: Enter the total carbon footprint (tCO2e) calculated for your establishment.
fields.calculation: Using carbon measurement tool (e.g., HCMI) to calculate total emissions from all sources
fields.aggregation: Aggregate all emission sources to organizational total
quality_checks: Ensure all relevant emission sources are included
Verify calculation methodology follows recognized standards
fields.notes: Carbon footprint calculation should include direct emissions from owned or controlled sources and indirect emissions from electricity.

carbon_specifications.co2e_equation: Total = Σ(activity_data × emission_factor) across all relevant sources
carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use UAE-specific or international standard emission factors for each activity stream
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: Use published UAE/region EFs, fallback to international standards if local not available
carbon_specifications.override_policy: Update factors if government releases new ones

intensity_outputs.equation: total CO2e / total occupied room nights

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If Electricity=27.6 tCO2e, Fuels=1.3 tCO2e, Waste=0.3 tCO2e, then Total = 29.2 tCO2e

fields.description: Total water consumption from all sources registered at least monthly
fields.wizard_question: Do you monitor your total water consumption monthly?
fields.prompt: Enter the total water consumed (in cubic meters) each month.
fields.calculation: Sum of water meter readings or billed volume over the period
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly water use to annual total; breakdown by site if multiple
quality_checks: Cross-verify billed water usage with meter readings
Flag anomalies (e.g., sudden surges indicating leaks)
fields.notes: Regular monitoring helps detect leaks and identify conservation opportunities.

carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use UAE-specific emission factors for water supply and wastewater treatment.
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: Use national average EFs if regional not available, fallback to international standards.
carbon_specifications.override_policy: Update factors if government releases new ones.

intensity_outputs.equation: total m³ / total occupied room nights

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If annual consumption = 10,000 m³ and EF = 0.000344 tCO2e/m³, then emissions = 3.44 tCO2e.

fields.description: Water flow rate in showers, which must not exceed 9 litres per minute in at least 75% of showers
fields.wizard_question: Do your showers have a maximum flow rate of 9 litres per minute?
fields.prompt: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your showerheads.
fields.calculation: Direct measurement of flow rate using flow meter or measuring container
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage of showers meeting the 9 L/min requirement
quality_checks: Verify at least 75% of showers meet the requirement
Ensure measurements are taken under normal operating pressure
fields.notes: Low-flow showerheads significantly reduce water consumption without affecting guest experience.

fields.description: Water flow rate in taps, which must not exceed 8 litres per minute in at least 75% of taps
fields.wizard_question: Do your taps have a maximum flow rate of 8 litres per minute?
fields.prompt: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your taps.
fields.calculation: Direct measurement of flow rate using flow meter or measuring container
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage of taps meeting the 8 L/min requirement
quality_checks: Verify at least 75% of taps meet the requirement
Ensure measurements are taken under normal operating pressure
fields.notes: Aerators and flow restrictors can be installed to reduce tap flow rates.

fields.description: Toilets with 3/6 litres dual flush system
fields.wizard_question: Are your newly purchased toilets dual flush (3/6 litres)?
fields.prompt: Confirm that newly purchased toilets have a 3/6 litres dual flush system.
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage of toilets with dual flush
quality_checks: Verify dual flush mechanism is working properly
Ensure flush volumes are 3 and 6 litres
fields.notes: Dual flush toilets can reduce water consumption by up to 67% compared to older models.

fields.description: Separate water meters installed in areas with high degree of water consumption
fields.condition_logic: Entity has areas with high water consumption (kitchens, pools, laundry)
fields.wizard_question: Do you have separate water meters for high consumption areas?
fields.prompt: Enter the monthly water consumption (m³) from sub-metered areas.
fields.calculation: Sum of sub-meter readings for high consumption areas
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly sub-meter readings to annual total
quality_checks: Verify sub-meters are installed in high consumption areas
Ensure readings are taken monthly
fields.notes: Sub-metering helps identify specific areas of high water use and target conservation efforts.

fields.description: Total energy use registered at least once a month
fields.wizard_question: Do you monitor your total electricity consumption monthly?
fields.prompt: Enter the total electricity consumed (in kWh) each month.
fields.calculation: Sum of electricity meter readings or billed volume over the period
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly electricity use to annual total; breakdown by site if multiple
quality_checks: Compare billed kWh against meter readings for consistency
Flag abnormal consumption spikes month-over-month
fields.notes: Regular monitoring helps identify energy conservation opportunities and unusual consumption patterns.

carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use UAE-specific grid emission factor (location-based) per kWh
carbon_specifications.ef_readiness_state: available (published by local authorities or international values)
ef_data_dependencies: Annual grid CO2 emission factor for each utility region
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: If company-specific factor unavailable, use national grid average EF
carbon_specifications.ef_review_cycle: Annually (update EF based on latest data)
carbon_specifications.override_policy: EF may be updated if government issues new factor; document any overrides

intensity_outputs.equation: total kWh / total occupied room nights

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If annual consumption = 120,000 kWh and EF = 0.00023 tCO2e/kWh, then emissions = 27.6 tCO2e.

fields.description: Percentage of energy-efficient light bulbs in the establishment
fields.wizard_question: What percentage of your light bulbs are energy-efficient?
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of energy-efficient light bulbs in your establishment.
fields.calculation: (Number of energy-efficient bulbs / Total number of bulbs) × 100
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage across all areas of the establishment
quality_checks: Verify at least 75% of bulbs are energy-efficient
Ensure calculation includes all lighting in the establishment
fields.notes: At least 75% of all light bulbs must be energy-efficient and at least 50% must be LED bulbs.

fields.description: Percentage of LED light bulbs in the establishment
fields.wizard_question: What percentage of your light bulbs are LED?
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of LED light bulbs in your establishment.
fields.calculation: (Number of LED bulbs / Total number of bulbs) × 100
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage across all areas of the establishment
quality_checks: Verify at least 50% of bulbs are LED
Ensure calculation includes all lighting in the establishment
fields.notes: LED bulbs use up to 90% less energy and last up to 25 times longer than incandescent bulbs.

fields.description: Percentage of renewable and/or eco-labelled electricity used or purchased by the establishment
fields.condition_logic: Entity purchases or generates renewable energy
fields.wizard_question: Do you use or purchase renewable energy?
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of renewable energy in your total energy consumption.
fields.calculation: (Renewable energy kWh / Total energy kWh) × 100
fields.aggregation: Calculate monthly percentage and aggregate to annual average
quality_checks: Verify renewable energy sources are certified
Ensure calculation method is consistent
fields.notes: There are two levels: 50% for basic guideline and 100% for advanced guideline.

fields.description: Total amount of waste generated by the establishment
fields.wizard_question: Do you track your total waste generation?
fields.prompt: Enter the total quantity of waste generated (kg) for the period.
fields.calculation: Sum of all waste collected from the facility
fields.aggregation: Aggregate waste data across all sites; break down by waste type if needed
quality_checks: Ensure units (kg/tonnes) are consistent across records
Compare waste generated per employee or per room against benchmarks
fields.notes: Tracking waste generation is the first step in implementing waste reduction strategies.

carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use default emission factors for landfill/incineration
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: If composition unknown, assume municipal solid waste default EF
carbon_specifications.ef_review_cycle: Annually or as waste management technology changes
carbon_specifications.override_policy: No override unless specific facility methane capture data is available

intensity_outputs.equation: total kg waste / total occupied room nights

carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If 5,000 kg waste generated and EF = 0.00006 tCO2e/kg, then ~0.3 tCO2e emitted.

fields.description: Percentage of waste diverted from landfill to recycling
fields.condition_logic: Entity separates and recycles part of its waste stream
fields.wizard_question: Do you track your recycling rate?
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of waste that is recycled.
fields.calculation: (Recycled waste kg / Total waste kg) × 100
fields.aggregation: Calculate monthly rate and aggregate to annual average
quality_checks: Verify recycled amount ≤ total waste generated for same period
Cross-check recycling records against waste generation
fields.notes: A higher recycling rate indicates better waste management practices.

fields.description: Amount of organic waste composted or used for other purposes
fields.condition_logic: Entity generates organic waste and has composting facilities
fields.wizard_question: Do you compost your organic waste?
fields.prompt: Enter the quantity of organic waste composted (kg) in the period.
fields.calculation: Sum of all organic waste sent for composting
fields.aggregation: Aggregate monthly composting quantities to annual total
quality_checks: Verify composting process meets environmental standards
Ensure organic waste is properly separated
fields.notes: Composting organic waste reduces methane emissions from landfills and produces valuable soil amendment.

fields.description: Number of types of food/beverage products that are organic, eco-labelled, fair-trade labelled and/or locally produced
fields.wizard_question: Do you purchase sustainable food products?
fields.prompt: Enter the number of types of sustainable food/beverage products you purchase.
fields.calculation: Count of distinct sustainable food/beverage product types
quality_checks: Verify minimum of five types of sustainable products
Ensure products have valid certifications
fields.notes: At least five types of sustainable products must be purchased and registered.

fields.description: Availability of vegetarian/vegan alternative menu options
fields.wizard_question: Do you offer vegetarian and vegan menu options?
fields.prompt: Confirm the availability of vegetarian and vegan menu options.
quality_checks: Verify vegetarian and vegan options are clearly marked on menus
Ensure kitchen staff are trained on preparation
fields.notes: Plant-based options generally have a lower environmental footprint than meat-based dishes.

fields.description: Appointment of an environmental manager from amongst the staff of the establishment responsible for sustainability initiatives
fields.wizard_question: Have you appointed an environmental manager from your staff?
fields.prompt: Confirm the appointment of an environmental manager responsible for sustainability initiatives.
quality_checks: Verify the environmental manager is included in the organizational structure
Ensure job description includes environmental responsibilities
fields.notes: The environmental manager can be any staff member but is typically from engineering, housekeeping, front desk, HR, or management.

fields.description: A formal sustainability policy covering environmental, social, and economic commitments of the establishment
fields.wizard_question: Do you have a formal sustainability policy?
fields.prompt: Confirm the existence of a sustainability policy covering environmental, social, and economic commitments.
quality_checks: Verify policy is less than 3 years old
Ensure policy covers both environmental and social commitments
fields.notes: The policy must include commitments to resource consumption, circular economy, reducing pollutants, carbon footprint reduction, and biodiversity protection.

fields.description: Objectives and annual action plan for continuous improvement with minimum three action points across different sustainability areas
fields.wizard_question: Do you have an annual action plan with sustainability objectives?
fields.prompt: Enter the number of action points in your annual sustainability action plan.
fields.calculation: Count of distinct action points in the annual plan
quality_checks: Verify minimum of three action points across different sustainability areas
Ensure action plan is available to staff
fields.notes: Action points should reflect concrete work toward fulfilling the sustainability policy.

fields.description: Concrete target set by the establishment to reduce its carbon footprint
fields.condition_logic: Entity has calculated its carbon footprint and is committed to reduction
fields.wizard_question: Have you set a target to reduce your carbon footprint?
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage reduction target for your carbon footprint.
fields.calculation: Percentage reduction target compared to baseline year
quality_checks: Verify target is specific, measurable, and time-bound
Ensure target is aligned with industry best practices
fields.notes: This is a guideline criterion that becomes mandatory after the first year of certification.

fields.description: System to regularly check for dripping taps and leaky toilets as well as leaky swimming pools
fields.wizard_question: Do you have a system to regularly check for water leaks?
fields.prompt: Enter the number of leak checks performed daily.
fields.calculation: Count of daily leak detection checks performed
fields.aggregation: Aggregate to monthly total of checks performed
quality_checks: Verify checks are performed daily
Ensure leaks are promptly repaired when detected
fields.notes: A single leaking toilet can waste 750 litres of water per day.

fields.description: Automatic systems that turn off lights and electrical appliances when leaving guest/meeting rooms
fields.condition_logic: Entity has implemented energy control systems
fields.wizard_question: Do you have automatic systems to turn off electricity when rooms are not in use?
fields.prompt: Confirm the presence of automatic energy control systems in guest and meeting rooms.
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage of rooms with automatic control systems
quality_checks: Verify systems are installed and functioning properly
Ensure systems cover at least 75% of guest rooms
fields.notes: Key card systems, motion sensors, and occupancy sensors are common types of automatic control systems.

fields.description: Number of waste categories separated as per national legislation with a minimum of three categories
fields.wizard_question: Do you separate waste into different categories?
fields.prompt: Enter the number of waste categories you separate for recycling.
fields.calculation: Count of distinct waste separation categories
quality_checks: Verify at least three categories are separated
Ensure separation meets national legislation requirements
fields.notes: Common categories include paper, plastic, glass, organic, and hazardous waste.

fields.description: Initiatives to reduce the level of food waste
fields.wizard_question: Do you have initiatives to reduce food waste?
fields.prompt: Confirm the implementation of food waste reduction initiatives.
quality_checks: Verify initiatives are documented and implemented
Ensure staff are trained on food waste reduction
fields.notes: Common initiatives include portion control, inventory management, and staff training.

fields.description: Percentage of chemical cleaning products for daily use that have a recognised eco-label
fields.wizard_question: Do you use eco-labeled cleaning products?
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of eco-labeled cleaning products you use.
fields.calculation: (Eco-labeled cleaning products / Total cleaning products) × 100
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage across all cleaning products used
quality_checks: Verify at least 75% of daily-use cleaning products are eco-labeled
Ensure eco-labels are recognized and valid
fields.notes: Eco-labeled products reduce environmental impact and improve indoor air quality.

fields.description: Use of paper towels, facial tissues and toilet paper made of non-chlorine bleached paper or awarded with an eco-label
fields.wizard_question: Do you use non-chlorine bleached or eco-labeled paper products?
fields.prompt: Confirm the use of non-chlorine bleached or eco-labeled paper products.
quality_checks: Verify paper products are non-chlorine bleached or eco-labeled
Ensure all paper products meet this requirement
fields.notes: Non-chlorine bleaching reduces harmful chemical release into the environment.

fields.description: Use of eco-labeled dishwashers, laundry machines, and other equipment
fields.wizard_question: Do you purchase eco-labeled equipment?
fields.prompt: Confirm that newly purchased equipment is eco-labeled.
fields.aggregation: Calculate percentage of newly purchased equipment that is eco-labeled
quality_checks: Verify newly purchased equipment is eco-labeled
Ensure eco-labels are recognized and valid
fields.notes: Eco-labeled equipment is more energy and water efficient, reducing environmental impact.

fields.description: Yearly training on environmental and other sustainability issues for staff members
fields.wizard_question: Do you provide yearly environmental training to your staff?
fields.prompt: Enter the total hours of environmental and sustainability training provided to staff annually.
fields.calculation: Sum of all environmental and sustainability training hours provided
fields.aggregation: Calculate average training hours per employee
quality_checks: Verify all staff receive training annually
Ensure training covers environmental and sustainability topics
fields.notes: Training should cover environmental management, sustainability initiatives, and specific green practices.

fields.description: Information about Green Key and environmental initiatives available to guests
fields.wizard_question: Do you provide environmental information to your guests?
fields.prompt: Confirm the availability of environmental information to guests.
quality_checks: Verify information is available in guest rooms and public areas
Ensure information is also available on the website
fields.notes: Information should cover Green Key certification, environmental initiatives, and how guests can participate.

fields.description: Active collaboration with relevant local stakeholders and support for community development activities
fields.condition_logic: Entity engages with local community and stakeholders
fields.wizard_question: Do you collaborate with local stakeholders on environmental initiatives?
fields.prompt: Enter the number of community engagement activities you participate in annually.
fields.calculation: Count of distinct community engagement activities
quality_checks: Verify activities are documented and implemented
Ensure activities support environmental or social sustainability
fields.notes: Activities could include environmental education, local conservation projects, or supporting local sustainable businesses.

fields.description: Total purchased electricity from the local grid (utility)
fields.prompt: Enter the total electricity consumed (in kWh) each month from your utility provider.

fields.description: Total water usage from municipal supply (or other sources) in operations
fields.prompt: Enter the total water consumed (in cubic meters) each month.

fields.description: Total chilled water energy consumed from a district cooling utility provider.
fields.prompt: Enter the total district cooling energy consumed (in RT-h) each month from your utility provider.

fields.description: Amount of liquefied petroleum gas (propane/LPG) consumed, e.g., for cooking or heating
fields.prompt: Enter the total LPG (propane) consumed (in kg) in the period.

fields.description: Total amount of non-hazardous solid waste generated (municipal/general waste)
fields.prompt: Enter the total quantity of general (non-hazardous) waste generated (kg) for the period.

fields.description: Amount of non-hazardous waste diverted from landfill to recycling (subset of total waste)
fields.prompt: Enter the quantity of waste recycled (kg) in the period (if any).

fields.description: Liters of gasoline (petrol) fuel consumed by company-owned vehicles (cars, vans, etc.)
fields.prompt: Enter the total petrol (gasoline) fuel consumed by company vehicles (liters per month).

fields.description: Liters of diesel fuel consumed by company-owned vehicles (trucks, heavy vehicles, or diesel cars)
fields.prompt: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed by company vehicles (liters per month).

fields.description: Quantity of refrigerant gases (e.g. HFCs) that are refilled or leaked from HVAC/Refrigeration systems
fields.prompt: Enter the total amount of refrigerant (kg) added or leaked in the reporting period (by type, if possible).

fields.description: Total greenhouse gas emissions (tCO2e) calculated from all reported activity data (Scope 1 and 2, baseline)
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's total greenhouse gas emissions for the reporting period

fields.description: Total amount of hazardous waste produced (chemicals, medical, e-waste, etc.) that requires special disposal
fields.prompt: Enter the total quantity of hazardous waste generated (kg) for the reporting period.

fields.description: Liters of diesel fuel consumed in on-site backup generators (stationary combustion)
fields.prompt: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed by generators (liters per month).

fields.description: Electricity generated from on-site renewable sources (e.g. solar panels) and used on-site
fields.prompt: Enter the electricity generated by your renewable energy system (kWh per month).

fields.description: Direct greenhouse gas emissions from owned or controlled sources
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's direct (Scope 1) greenhouse gas emissions

fields.description: Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from purchased electricity, steam, heat, and cooling
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's indirect (Scope 2) greenhouse gas emissions from purchased energy

fields.description: Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from the value chain (not included in Scope 2)
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's value chain (Scope 3) greenhouse gas emissions, if applicable

fields.description: Greenhouse gas emissions from the baseline year selected for tracking progress
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's baseline year emissions and specify the baseline year

fields.description: Organization's target for reducing greenhouse gas emissions in alignment with UAE climate neutrality goals
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's emissions reduction target (percentage reduction from baseline)

fields.description: Description of current and planned measures to reduce greenhouse gas emissions
fields.prompt: Describe your organization's current and planned measures to reduce greenhouse gas emissions

fields.description: Quantity of carbon offsets purchased to compensate for emissions
fields.prompt: Enter the quantity of carbon offsets purchased during the reporting period

fields.description: Monthly reporting of carbon emissions through the Dubai Carbon Calculator covering 9 emission sources: electricity, water, district cooling, LPG, landfill waste, recycled waste, petrol, diesel, and refrigerants
fields.prompt: Do you submit monthly carbon emission data through the Dubai Carbon Calculator? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of an energy management plan including monitoring, targets, and conservation measures
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal energy management plan in place? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of automated systems for energy management and efficiency optimization
fields.prompt: Do you have automated systems for energy management? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable transportation options for guests and staff including electric vehicles and public transport
fields.prompt: Do you provide sustainable transportation options for guests and staff? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of water conservation measures including efficient fixtures, monitoring, and reduction targets
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal water conservation measures in place? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of wastewater management practices including treatment, reuse, and proper disposal
fields.prompt: Do you have formal wastewater management practices in place? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of a comprehensive waste management plan including reduction, recycling, and proper disposal
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal waste management plan in place? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable waste management practices specifically for bathroom areas including refillable dispensers and recycling
fields.prompt: Do you have sustainable waste management practices in bathrooms? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable food waste management practices including reduction, donation, and composting
fields.prompt: Do you have sustainable food waste management practices? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of practices to minimize pollution including air, noise, light, and chemical pollution
fields.prompt: Do you have practices to minimize pollution? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Management and reduction of harmful substances including chemicals, pesticides, and hazardous materials
fields.prompt: Do you have practices to manage and reduce harmful substances? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable purchasing practices including local, eco-friendly, and ethical sourcing
fields.prompt: Do you have sustainable purchasing practices? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Concrete target set by the establishment to reduce its carbon footprint
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage reduction target for your carbon footprint.

fields.description: Water flow rate in showers, which must not exceed 9 litres per minute in at least 75% of showers
fields.prompt: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your showerheads.

fields.description: Water flow rate in taps, which must not exceed 8 litres per minute in at least 75% of taps
fields.prompt: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your taps.

fields.description: Toilets with 3/6 litres dual flush system
fields.prompt: Confirm that newly purchased toilets have a 3/6 litres dual flush system.

fields.description: Separate water meters installed in areas with high degree of water consumption
fields.prompt: Enter the monthly water consumption (m³) from sub-metered areas.

fields.description: Percentage of energy-efficient light bulbs in the establishment
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of energy-efficient light bulbs in your establishment.

fields.description: Percentage of LED light bulbs in the establishment
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of LED light bulbs in your establishment.

fields.description: Percentage of renewable and/or eco-labelled electricity used or purchased by the establishment
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of renewable energy in your total energy consumption.

fields.description: Percentage of waste diverted from landfill to recycling
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of waste that is recycled.

fields.description: Amount of organic waste composted or used for other purposes
fields.prompt: Enter the quantity of organic waste composted (kg) in the period.

fields.description: Number of types of food/beverage products that are organic, eco-labelled, fair-trade labelled and/or locally produced
fields.prompt: Enter the number of types of sustainable food/beverage products you purchase.

fields.description: Availability of vegetarian/vegan alternative menu options
fields.prompt: Confirm the availability of vegetarian and vegan menu options.

fields.description: Type of organization and ownership (e.g., LLC, PJSC, partnership; private vs government ownership)
fields.prompt: Specify your company's legal form and ownership structure (e.g., 'LLC – privately owned').

fields.description: Total number of board directors (board size)
fields.prompt: Enter the total number of board members (directors).

fields.description: Percentage of board seats occupied by women
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of board members who are female.

fields.description: Whether the company has a formal ethics code or anti-bribery & corruption policy (Yes/No)
fields.prompt: Does your company have a written Ethics or Anti-Corruption policy? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Whether the company has an occupational health and/or safety policy (Yes/No)
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal occupational health and safety policy? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Frequency with which the company produces ESG/Sustainability reports (e.g., annually, biennially, or none)
fields.prompt: How often do you publish a sustainability/ESG report? (e.g., annually, once every 2 years, not yet)

fields.description: Whether the company has a data protection/privacy policy and data governance processes (Yes/No)
fields.prompt: Do you have a data privacy or data governance policy in place to protect personal and sensitive data? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Whether the company has a formal code of conduct for its suppliers, outlining expectations on ethics, labor, and environment, and communicates it to them.
fields.prompt: Does your company have a formal Supplier Code of Conduct that is communicated to your suppliers? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Whether the greenhouse gas emissions inventory has been verified by an independent third party
fields.prompt: Has your organization's emissions inventory been verified by an independent third party? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Period for which emissions records are maintained (minimum 5 years as required by law)
fields.prompt: Enter the period (in years) for which your organization retains emissions records

fields.description: Assessment of climate-related risks to the organization's operations and strategy
fields.prompt: Describe your organization's climate risk assessment process and key findings

fields.description: Whether the board or governing body has oversight of climate-related issues and targets
fields.prompt: Does your board or governing body have oversight of climate-related issues and targets? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of a sustainability management system addressing environmental, social, cultural, economic, quality, human rights, health, safety, risk and crisis management issues
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal sustainability management system in place? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Establishment of a sustainability committee or team responsible for coordinating sustainability initiatives
fields.prompt: Do you have a formal sustainability committee or team? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Implementation of sustainable practices for events, meetings, and conferences held at the hotel
fields.prompt: Do you implement sustainable practices for events and conferences? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Appointment of an environmental manager from amongst the staff of the establishment responsible for sustainability initiatives
fields.prompt: Confirm the appointment of an environmental manager responsible for sustainability initiatives.

fields.description: A formal sustainability policy covering environmental, social, and economic commitments of the establishment
fields.prompt: Confirm the existence of a sustainability policy covering environmental, social, and economic commitments.

fields.description: Objectives and annual action plan for continuous improvement with minimum three action points across different sustainability areas
fields.prompt: Enter the number of action points in your annual sustainability action plan.

fields.description: System to regularly check for dripping taps and leaky toilets as well as leaky swimming pools
fields.prompt: Enter the number of leak checks performed daily.

fields.description: Automatic systems that turn off lights and electrical appliances when leaving guest/meeting rooms
fields.prompt: Confirm the presence of automatic energy control systems in guest and meeting rooms.

fields.description: Number of waste categories separated as per national legislation with a minimum of three categories
fields.prompt: Enter the number of waste categories you separate for recycling.

fields.description: Initiatives to reduce the level of food waste
fields.prompt: Confirm the implementation of food waste reduction initiatives.

fields.description: Percentage of chemical cleaning products for daily use that have a recognised eco-label
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of eco-labeled cleaning products you use.

fields.description: Use of paper towels, facial tissues and toilet paper made of non-chlorine bleached paper or awarded with an eco-label
fields.prompt: Confirm the use of non-chlorine bleached or eco-labeled paper products.

fields.description: Use of eco-labeled dishwashers, laundry machines, and other equipment
fields.prompt: Confirm that newly purchased equipment is eco-labeled.

fields.description: Total number of employees in the organization (headcount or full-time equivalent)
fields.prompt: Enter the total number of employees (headcount or FTE) in your company.

fields.description: Proportion of the workforce that is female (gender diversity metric)
fields.prompt: Enter the percentage of your employees who are female (% of total workforce).

fields.description: Number of new employees hired over the reporting period
fields.prompt: Enter the total number of new employees hired during the year.

fields.description: Percentage of employees who left the organization during the reporting period
fields.prompt: Enter the employee turnover rate for the year (% of employees who left).

fields.description: Average number of training hours provided per employee during the year
fields.prompt: Enter the total training hours provided to employees this year (the system will compute hours per employee).

fields.description: Frequency of work-related injuries resulting in lost time, per 1,000,000 hours worked
fields.prompt: Enter your company's Lost Time Injury Frequency Rate (LTIFR) for the year (injuries per 1,000,000 hours worked).

fields.description: Total number of work-related injuries and incidents (recordable cases) in the reporting period
fields.prompt: Enter the total number of recordable injuries (including any fatalities, lost time injuries, etc.) that occurred during the year.

fields.description: Number of formal grievances or complaints raised by employees (or other stakeholders) during the year
fields.prompt: Enter the number of formal grievances/complaints submitted by employees or stakeholders this year.

fields.description: Number of grievances (from those reported) that were resolved/addressed during the year
fields.prompt: Enter how many of the reported grievances were resolved during the year.

fields.description: Total number of different nationalities represented in the workforce, indicating cultural diversity.
fields.prompt: Enter the total number of distinct nationalities present in your workforce.

fields.description: Total value of financial and in-kind contributions made to the community, such as charitable donations, sponsorships, employee volunteering hours, and pro-bono services.
fields.prompt: Enter the total value (in AED) of your community investment, including cash, in-kind donations, and volunteering hours, for the year.

fields.description: Training provided to personnel on sustainability practices and procedures
fields.prompt: Do you provide formal sustainability training to your personnel? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Programs for engaging and educating staff on sustainability practices and environmental responsibility
fields.prompt: Do you have formal staff engagement and education programs for sustainability? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Programs and materials to educate guests about sustainability practices and encourage their participation
fields.prompt: Do you educate guests about your sustainability practices? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Engagement with and support for local communities through various initiatives and partnerships
fields.prompt: Do you have formal local community engagement initiatives? (Yes/No)

fields.description: Yearly training on environmental and other sustainability issues for staff members
fields.prompt: Enter the total hours of environmental and sustainability training provided to staff annually.

fields.description: Information about Green Key and environmental initiatives available to guests
fields.prompt: Confirm the availability of environmental information to guests.

fields.description: Active collaboration with relevant local stakeholders and support for community development activities
fields.prompt: Enter the number of community engagement activities you participate in annually.

fields.description: Total greenhouse gas emissions (tCO2e) from all sources as required by UAE Climate Change Law
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's total greenhouse gas emissions for the reporting period
fields.calculation: Sum of Scope 1, Scope 2, and applicable Scope 3 emissions
fields.aggregation: Aggregate all site-level emissions to organizational total
quality_checks: Verify all emission sources are included
Check calculation methodology aligns with GHG Protocol
Ensure emission factors are UAE-specific or IPCC defaults
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Must include all six GHGs (CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6).

carbon_specifications.co2e_equation: Total = Σ(activity_data_i × EF_i) for all emission sources
carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use UAE-specific emission factors where available, otherwise IPCC defaults
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: Use published UAE factors, fallback to IPCC if local not available
carbon_specifications.override_policy: Update factors if government releases new ones
carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If Scope 1=10 tCO2e, Scope 2=20 tCO2e, Scope 3=5 tCO2e, then Total = 35 tCO2e

fields.description: Direct greenhouse gas emissions from owned or controlled sources
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's direct (Scope 1) greenhouse gas emissions
fields.calculation: Sum of emissions from stationary combustion, mobile combustion, process emissions, and fugitive emissions
fields.aggregation: Aggregate all Scope 1 sources to organizational total
quality_checks: Verify all emission sources are identified and included
Check calculation methodology for each emission category
Ensure proper emission factors are applied
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Includes CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6 from owned sources.

carbon_specifications.co2e_equation: Scope 1 = Σ(activity_data_i × EF_i) for all direct emission sources
carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use source-specific emission factors (e.g., fuel type, refrigerant type)
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: Use UAE-specific factors where available, otherwise IPCC defaults
carbon_specifications.override_policy: Update factors if government releases new ones
carbon_specifications.example_calculation: If diesel=500L (EF=2.68kg/L), refrigerant=10kg R134a (GWP=1300), then Scope 1 = (500×0.00268) + (10×1.3) = 1.34 + 13 = 14.34 tCO2e

fields.description: Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from purchased electricity, steam, heat, and cooling
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's indirect (Scope 2) greenhouse gas emissions from purchased energy
fields.calculation: Sum of emissions from purchased electricity, steam, heat, and cooling
fields.aggregation: Aggregate all Scope 2 sources to organizational total
quality_checks: Verify all energy purchases are included
Check utility bills against meter readings
Ensure correct emission factors are applied for each energy type
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Includes emissions from purchased electricity, steam, heat, and cooling.

carbon_specifications.co2e_equation: Scope 2 = Σ(energy_consumed_i × EF_i) for each energy type
carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use UAE grid emission factors for electricity, provider-specific factors for steam/heat/cooling
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: Use published UAE factors, fallback to IPCC if local not available
carbon_specifications.override_policy: Update factors if government releases new ones

fields.description: Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from the value chain (not included in Scope 2)
fields.condition_logic: Entity has significant value chain emissions or chooses to report Scope 3
fields.wizard_question: Does your organization have significant value chain emissions that should be reported?
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's value chain (Scope 3) greenhouse gas emissions, if applicable
fields.calculation: Sum of emissions from relevant Scope 3 categories
fields.aggregation: Aggregate all relevant Scope 3 categories
quality_checks: Verify data collection methodology for each Scope 3 category
Check supplier data quality and coverage
Ensure appropriate emission factors are applied
fields.notes: Conditional reporting based on materiality and relevance. Required for entities with significant value chain emissions.

carbon_specifications.co2e_equation: Scope 3 = Σ(activity_data_i × EF_i) for each relevant category
carbon_specifications.ef_determination: Use category-specific emission factors (e.g., waste, business travel, purchased goods)
carbon_specifications.ef_default_strategy: Use published UAE factors where available, otherwise IPCC defaults
carbon_specifications.override_policy: Update factors if government releases new ones

fields.description: Greenhouse gas emissions from the baseline year selected for tracking progress
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's baseline year emissions and specify the baseline year
fields.calculation: Total emissions (Scope 1+2+3) from the selected baseline year
quality_checks: Verify baseline year selection methodology
Check consistency with organizational boundaries
Ensure calculation methodology aligns with current reporting
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Baseline year should be representative of normal operations.

fields.description: Organization's target for reducing greenhouse gas emissions in alignment with UAE climate neutrality goals
fields.prompt: Enter your organization's emissions reduction target (percentage reduction from baseline)
fields.calculation: Target percentage reduction from baseline emissions
quality_checks: Verify target is aligned with UAE Net Zero 2050 strategy
Check target has been approved by senior management
Ensure target is specific, measurable, and time-bound
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Should align with national climate neutrality pathway.

fields.description: Description of current and planned measures to reduce greenhouse gas emissions
fields.prompt: Describe your organization's current and planned measures to reduce greenhouse gas emissions
quality_checks: Verify measures are specific and actionable
Check alignment with reduction targets
Ensure measures cover relevant emission sources
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Should include energy efficiency, renewable energy, and other mitigation measures.

fields.description: Quantity of carbon offsets purchased to compensate for emissions
fields.condition_logic: Entity engages in carbon offsetting activities
fields.wizard_question: Does your organization purchase carbon offsets to compensate for emissions?
fields.prompt: Enter the quantity of carbon offsets purchased during the reporting period
fields.calculation: Sum of all carbon offsets purchased
quality_checks: Verify offsets are from recognized standards
Check verification status of offsets
Ensure no double counting of offsets
fields.notes: Conditional reporting for entities using carbon offsetting. Offsets must be verified and registered.

fields.description: Whether the greenhouse gas emissions inventory has been verified by an independent third party
fields.prompt: Has your organization's emissions inventory been verified by an independent third party? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify verification body is accredited
Check verification statement covers all reported emissions
Ensure verification is current for reporting period
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Verification enhances credibility of reported data.

fields.description: Period for which emissions records are maintained (minimum 5 years as required by law)
fields.prompt: Enter the period (in years) for which your organization retains emissions records
quality_checks: Verify retention period meets minimum legal requirement (5 years)
Check records are accessible for audits
Ensure secure storage of records
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Minimum 5 years retention.

fields.description: Assessment of climate-related risks to the organization's operations and strategy
fields.prompt: Describe your organization's climate risk assessment process and key findings
quality_checks: Verify assessment covers physical and transition risks
Check alignment with TCFD recommendations
Ensure assessment informs strategy and planning
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Should address both physical and transition climate risks.

fields.description: Whether the board or governing body has oversight of climate-related issues and targets
fields.prompt: Does your board or governing body have oversight of climate-related issues and targets? (Yes/No)
quality_checks: Verify board explicitly discusses climate issues
Check climate targets are approved by board
Ensure regular reporting to board on climate progress
fields.notes: Required for UAE Climate Change Law compliance. Demonstrates senior management commitment to climate action.
